column5: My brother says he knows a guy who says he has a cabin on Ghost Lake near Eagle lake. I have looked at all kinds of maps and cannot find a Ghost lake in that area. It is not Ghost River but Ghost lake. Anybody know anything about it or exactly where that lake is located. Thanks Rip
I could be wrong, but I believe that it is near Dryden....
South & east of Dryden 49 11' 42.35 N 92 16' 34.88 W
Slightly north and a little east of Dryden, close to the airport.
Waste of time anyway....dont bother....no fish in it anyway.
